item.title: 300 Line AutoSpammer (Pretty as a picture)
item.dc:creator: @piddlefiddle piddlefiddle
item.description:
@piddlefiddle wrote:

[quote=“Macro2Much, post:6, topic:7540”]Hehe, keep up the good work 1337. Remember practice ALWAYS makes better…I’m trying to make an autologin script, lol.[/quote]Ive made one you have to do this…erm…ok…

[scar]program Autologin;
const
//------Setup------//
username =‘enter your username here’ ;
password =‘enter your password here’ ;
//-----------------//

begin
MoveMouseSmooth(468, 291)
wait(100);
ClickMouse(468, 291,true)
wait(500);
Sendkeys(username)
wait(500);
MoveMouseSmooth(373, 274)
wait(100);
ClickMouse(373, 274,true)
wait(500);
SendKeys(password)
wait(500);
MoveMouseSmooth(331, 320)
wait(100);
ClickMouse(331, 320,true)
wait(600);
end.[/scar]

item.title: 300 Line AutoSpammer (Pretty as a picture)
item.description:
@1337 wrote:

well, here it is, probably the biggest waste of time ever

Nice little GUI at the beggining though 

{<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>)
(<<<<<     ___   _____   _____   ______   __          >>>>>)
(<<<<<    /   | |__   | |__   | |___   | |  |         >>>>>)
(<<<<<   /_   |   _|  |   _|  |    /  /  /_/ ____     >>>>>)
(<<<<<     |  |  |_   |  |_   |   /  /      | ___|    >>>>>)
(<<<<<     |  |  __|  |  __|  |  |  |       |___ |    >>>>>)
(<<<<<     |__| |_____| |_____|  |__|       |____|    >>>>>)
(<<<<<                                                >>>>>)
(<<<<<       A  U  T  O  -  S  P  A  M  M  E  R       >>>>>)
(<<<<<                                                >>>>>)
(<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>>}

{**********************************************************)
(******                  MADE BY 1337                ******)
(**********************************************************}

{**********************************************************)
(******         THIS SCRIPT IS COMPLETELY FREE       ******)
(**********************************************************}

{**********************************************************)
(******            THIS IS MY FIRST SCRIPT           ******)
(**********************************************************}

{**********************************************************)
(******  BIG THANKS TO MAD COW FOR HIS/HER FORM TUT  ******)
(**********************************************************}

program leet_spammer;
var
   frmDesign : TForm;
   Label1 : TLabel;
   Label2 : TLabel;
   Label3 : TLabel;
   MessageToSpam : TEdit;
   GroupBox1 : TGroupBox;
   YellowRadio : TRadioButton;
   WhiteRadio : TRadioButton;
   RedRadio : TRadioButton;
   RadioButton4 : TRadioButton;
   GreenRadio : TRadioButton;
   Edit2 : TEdit;
   StartButton : TButton;
   Edit3 : TEdit;
   TheMessage : String;
   TimeGap :Integer;
   HowManyTimes, HowMany2 : Integer;
   RCheck, YCheck, WCheck, GCheck, Bcheck : boolean;
   
procedure SetupAll;
begin
     TheMessage := MessageToSpam.Text;
     TimeGap := strtoint(Edit2.Text);
     HowManyTimes := strtoint(edit3.Text);
     HowMany2 := strtoint(edit3.Text);
     RCheck := Redradio.Checked;
     YCheck := YellowRadio.Checked;
     WCheck := WhiteRadio.Checked;
     GCheck := GreenRadio.Checked;
     BCheck := RadioButton4.Checked;
end;

procedure ButtonClick(sender: TObject);
begin
  WriteLn('1337s AutoSpammer is Starting...');
  frmDesign.Caption:= frmDesign.Caption + '.';
  frmDesign.ModalResult:= mrOk;
end;
  
procedure InitForm;
begin
     frmDesign := CreateForm;
     frmDesign.Left := 250;
     frmDesign.Top := 114;
     frmDesign.Width := 352;
     frmDesign.Height := 258;
     frmDesign.Caption := '1337'#39's Spammer';
     frmDesign.Color := clBtnFace;
     frmDesign.Font.Color := clWindowText;
     frmDesign.Font.Height := -11;
     frmDesign.Font.Name := 'MS Sans Serif';
     frmDesign.Font.Style := [];
     frmDesign.Visible := False;
     frmDesign.PixelsPerInch := 96;
     Label1 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
     Label1.Parent := frmDesign;
     Label1.Left := 11;
     Label1.Top := 5;
     Label1.Width := 86;
     Label1.Height := 13;
     Label1.Caption := 'Message to spam:';
     Label2 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
     Label2.Parent := frmDesign;
     Label2.Left := 10;
     Label2.Top := 108;
     Label2.Width := 157;
     Label2.Height := 13;
     Label2.Caption := 'Time gap in messages (seconds):';
     Label3 := TLabel.Create(frmDesign);
     Label3.Parent := frmDesign;
     Label3.Left := 12;
     Label3.Top := 153;
     Label3.Width := 116;
     Label3.Height := 13;
     Label3.Caption := 'Times to spam message:';
     MessageToSpam := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
     MessageToSpam.Parent := frmDesign;
     MessageToSpam.Left := 10;
     MessageToSpam.Top := 22;
     MessageToSpam.Width := 325;
     MessageToSpam.Height := 21;
     MessageToSpam.TabOrder := 0;
     MessageToSpam.Text := 'www.moparisthebest.com - for all your Runescape cheating needs!';
     GroupBox1 := TGroupBox.Create(frmDesign);
     GroupBox1.Parent := frmDesign;
     GroupBox1.Left := 10;
     GroupBox1.Top := 48;
     GroupBox1.Width := 324;
     GroupBox1.Height := 55;
     GroupBox1.Caption := 'Text Colour:';
     GroupBox1.TabOrder := 1;
     YellowRadio := TRadioButton.Create(GroupBox1);
     YellowRadio.Parent := GroupBox1;
     YellowRadio.Left := 12;
     YellowRadio.Top := 23;
     YellowRadio.Width := 71;
     YellowRadio.Height := 17;
     YellowRadio.Caption := 'Yellow';
     YellowRadio.Checked := True;
     YellowRadio.TabOrder := 0;
     WhiteRadio := TRadioButton.Create(GroupBox1);
     WhiteRadio.Parent := GroupBox1;
     WhiteRadio.Left := 68;
     WhiteRadio.Top := 23;
     WhiteRadio.Width := 113;
     WhiteRadio.Height := 17;
     WhiteRadio.Caption := 'White';
     WhiteRadio.TabOrder := 1;
     RedRadio := TRadioButton.Create(GroupBox1);
     RedRadio.Parent := GroupBox1;
     RedRadio.Left := 120;
     RedRadio.Top := 23;
     RedRadio.Width := 113;
     RedRadio.Height := 17;
     RedRadio.Caption := 'Red';
     RedRadio.TabOrder := 2;
     RadioButton4 := TRadioButton.Create(GroupBox1);
     RadioButton4.Parent := GroupBox1;
     RadioButton4.Left := 165;
     RadioButton4.Top := 23;
     RadioButton4.Width := 113;
     RadioButton4.Height := 17;
     RadioButton4.Caption := 'Blue';
     RadioButton4.TabOrder := 3;
     GreenRadio := TRadioButton.Create(GroupBox1);
     GreenRadio.Parent := GroupBox1;
     GreenRadio.Left := 210;
     GreenRadio.Top := 23;
     GreenRadio.Width := 113;
     GreenRadio.Height := 17;
     GreenRadio.Caption := 'Green';
     GreenRadio.TabOrder := 4;
     Edit2 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
     Edit2.Parent := frmDesign;
     Edit2.Left := 10;
     Edit2.Top := 125;
     Edit2.Width := 324;
     Edit2.Height := 21;
     Edit2.TabOrder := 2;
     Edit2.Text := '6';
     StartButton := TButton.Create(frmDesign);
     StartButton.Parent := frmDesign;
     StartButton.OnClick := @ButtonClick;
     StartButton.Left := 116;
     StartButton.Top := 199;
     StartButton.Width := 93;
     StartButton.Height := 25;
     StartButton.Caption := 'Start The Spam!';
     StartButton.TabOrder := 3;
     Edit3 := TEdit.Create(frmDesign);
     Edit3.Parent := frmDesign;
     Edit3.Left := 12;
     Edit3.Top := 169;
     Edit3.Width := 323;
     Edit3.Height := 21;
     Edit3.TabOrder := 4;
     Edit3.Text := '10';
end;

procedure SafeInitForm;
var
   v: TVariantArray;
begin
   setarraylength(V, 0);
   ThreadSafeCall('InitForm', v);
end;

procedure ShowFormModal;
begin
   frmDesign.ShowModal;
end;

procedure SafeShowFormModal;
var
   v: TVariantArray;
begin
   setarraylength(V, 0);
   ThreadSafeCall('ShowFormModal', v);
end;

procedure ProgReport;
begin
   ClearDebug;
   writeln('Message: ' + TheMessage);
   writeln('Time Gap: ' + Inttostr(TimeGap) + ' seconds');
   writeln('Times Left: ' + Inttostr(HowManyTimes));
   if(RCheck = true) then
       begin
       writeln('Colour: Red');
       end
     else if(YCheck = true) then
       begin
       writeln('Colour: Yellow');
       end
     else if(WCheck = true) then
       begin
       writeln('Colour: White');
       end
     else if(GCheck = true) then
       begin
       writeln('Colour: Green');
       end
     else if(BCheck = true) then
       begin
       writeln('Colour: Blue');
       end
end;

procedure PrintMessage;
begin
     wait(TimeGap * 1000);
     if(RCheck = true) then
       begin
       Sendkeys('red: ' + TheMessage + chr(13));
       end
     else if(YCheck = true) then
       begin
       Sendkeys(TheMessage + chr(13));
       end
     else if(WCheck = true) then
       begin
       Sendkeys('white: ' + TheMessage + chr(13));
       end
     else if(GCheck = true) then
       begin
       Sendkeys('green: ' + TheMessage + chr(13));
       end
     else if(BCheck = true) then
       begin
       Sendkeys('blue: ' + TheMessage + chr(13));
       end
end;

procedure WaitingTime;
begin
     cleardebug;
     writeln('WARNING: YOU HAVE 5 SECONDS TO SELECT THE RUNESCAPE SCREEN!')
     wait(1000);
     cleardebug;
     writeln('WARNING: YOU HAVE 4 SECONDS TO SELECT THE RUNESCAPE SCREEN!')
     wait(1000);
     cleardebug;
     writeln('WARNING: YOU HAVE 3 SECONDS TO SELECT THE RUNESCAPE SCREEN!')
     wait(1000);
     cleardebug;
     writeln('WARNING: YOU HAVE 2 SECONDS TO SELECT THE RUNESCAPE SCREEN!')
     wait(1000);
     cleardebug;
     writeln('WARNING: YOU HAVE 1 SECONDS TO SELECT THE RUNESCAPE SCREEN!')
     wait(1000);
     writeln('AUTOSPAMMER STARTING!')
     wait(1500);
end;

begin
   SafeInitForm;
   SafeShowFormModal;
   SetupAll;
   WaitingTime;
   ProgReport;
   repeat
   PrintMessage;
   HowManyTimes := HowManyTimes - 1;
   ProgReport;
   until(HowManyTimes = 0);
   writeln('-------------------------------');
   writeln('1337s Auto Spammer has spammed your message ' + inttostr(HowMany2) + ' times.');
   writeln('I hope you had a good time spamming - 1337.');
   writeln('-------------------------------');
end.

Heheh… Enjoy!
